# Skyglide — Personalised AI for Claude

Skyglide personalises how Claude communicates with you. Based on a 5-minute cognitive assessment, Claude adapts its formatting, structure, vocabulary, and presentation style to match how your brain processes information best.

In studies with thousands of users, personalised AI outputs led to **up to 30% better understanding**.

## Installation

### From the Cowork Plugin Marketplace (recommended)

Once listed: Plugins sidebar → search "Skyglide" → install

### From GitHub

Add this repo as a marketplace source, then install the plugin:

```
/plugin marketplace add deejrushton/skyglide-cowork-plugin
/plugin install skyglide@skyglide-plugins
```

### From URL

```
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/deejrushton/skyglide-cowork-plugin
/plugin install skyglide@skyglide-plugins
```

### Manual upload (for testing)

Download the latest release ZIP and upload via Plugins → Upload plugin in Cowork.

## Getting Started

After installing:

1. **Say "set up Skyglide"** — Claude will walk you through the setup
2. **Complete the brain games** at [skyglide.ai](https://skyglide.ai?utm_source=cowork&utm_medium=plugin&utm_campaign=skyglide_cowork_v1) (free, ~5 minutes)
3. **Paste your profile** — copy from your results page and paste it into Cowork
4. **Restart Claude Desktop** — so the profile loads into new conversations

That's it. From that point on, every response Claude gives you is personalised.

## How It Works

See the [plugin README](skyglide/README.md) for full details on architecture, updating, and troubleshooting.

## Repository Structure

```
skyglide-cowork-plugin/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── marketplace.json        # Marketplace directory listing
├── skyglide/                   # The plugin
│   ├── .claude-plugin/
│   │   └── plugin.json         # Plugin manifest
│   ├── skills/
│   │   ├── setup/
│   │   │   └── SKILL.md        # Setup and update flow
│   │   └── uninstall/
│   │       └── SKILL.md        # Clean removal from CLAUDE.md
│   ├── .mcp.json               # Empty (no external connections)
│   └── README.md               # Plugin documentation
├── LICENSE                     # Apache 2.0
└── README.md                   # This file
```

## Privacy & Security

- **Local only** — your profile is stored on your machine as markdown. No data is sent to external servers.
- **No MCP servers** — this plugin has no external connections.
- **No diagnostic labels** — the profile contains formatting preferences, not clinical assessments.
- **Open source** — inspect every file. The plugin is markdown and JSON, nothing compiled.

## License

Apache 2.0 — see [LICENSE](LICENSE)

## Links

- [Plugin Documentation](skyglide/README.md) — Full plugin docs
- [Submit to Plugin Directory](https://clau.de/plugin-directory-submission) — Anthropic's official directory

# Skyglide — Personalised AI for Cowork

Skyglide personalises how Claude communicates with you. Based on a 5-minute cognitive assessment, Claude adapts its formatting, structure, vocabulary, and presentation style to match how your brain processes information best.

In studies with thousands of users, personalised AI outputs led to **up to 30% better understanding**.

## Getting Started

1. **Install the plugin** — from the Cowork plugin marketplace, or add the GitHub repo as a marketplace source
2. **Say "set up Skyglide"** — Claude will walk you through the setup
3. **Complete the brain games** at [skyglide.ai](https://skyglide.ai?utm_source=cowork&utm_medium=plugin&utm_campaign=skyglide_cowork_v1) (free, ~5 minutes)
4. **Paste your profile** — copy from your results page and paste it into Cowork
5. **Restart Claude Desktop** — so the profile loads into new conversations

That's it. From that point on, every response Claude gives you is personalised.

## How It Works

### Two Skills

The plugin has two skills:

- **setup** — triggered when you say "set up Skyglide", "update my Skyglide profile", or paste a profile. Writes your full profile into CLAUDE.md.
- **uninstall** — triggered when you say "remove Skyglide" or "uninstall Skyglide". Removes the profile block from CLAUDE.md, since uninstalling the plugin alone won't clean it up.

Personalisation doesn't need a skill. Your profile lives in CLAUDE.md, which Claude reads automatically on every message. No invocation required.

### Where Your Profile Lives

Your Skyglide profile is embedded **directly in CLAUDE.md** between `<!-- SKYGLIDE:START -->` and `<!-- SKYGLIDE:END -->` markers. This follows the same pattern used by Anthropic's own productivity plugin for persistent memory.

CLAUDE.md is loaded into every Cowork conversation automatically — it's the only truly always-on mechanism.

This means:
- It loads automatically in every Cowork session
- It works across all projects and working directories
- It persists between sessions (after restarting Claude Desktop)
- It coexists with other CLAUDE.md content (memory management, other plugins)
- You can inspect or edit it at any time

### Using in Claude.ai Chat

The setup flow can also create a **Custom Style** for Claude.ai chat. Styles are the only truly always-on mechanism in the chat interface. Set your Skyglide style as default and it applies to every conversation automatically.

### Updating Your Profile

If you play new Skyglide games or want to refresh your profile:
1. Visit [skyglide.ai](https://skyglide.ai?utm_source=cowork&utm_medium=plugin&utm_campaign=skyglide_cowork_v1)
2. Copy your updated profile
3. Say "update my Skyglide profile" in Cowork
4. Paste the new version

The setup skill will surgically replace just the Skyglide block in CLAUDE.md, preserving everything else.

## Privacy & Security

- **Local only** — your profile is stored on your machine as a markdown file. No data is sent to external servers.
- **No MCP servers** — this plugin has no external connections.
- **No diagnostic labels** — the profile contains formatting preferences, not clinical assessments.
- **Open source** — inspect every file. The plugin is markdown and JSON, nothing compiled.
- **You control it** — say "uninstall Skyglide" or manually remove the Skyglide block from `~/.claude/CLAUDE.md` at any time.

## Plugin Structure

```
skyglide/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── plugin.json           # Plugin manifest
├── skills/
│   ├── setup/
│   │   └── SKILL.md          # Setup and update flow
│   └── uninstall/
│       └── SKILL.md          # Clean removal from CLAUDE.md
├── .mcp.json                 # Empty (no external connections)
└── README.md                 # This file
```

See the [repo-level README](../README.md) for the full repository structure and installation instructions.

## Installation Methods

### From Marketplace (recommended)
Once approved: Plugins sidebar → search "Skyglide" → install

### From GitHub
```
/plugin marketplace add deejrushton/skyglide-cowork-plugin
/plugin install skyglide@skyglide-plugins
```

### Manual (for testing)
Upload the plugin ZIP via Plugins → Upload plugin

## Requirements

- Claude Desktop for macOS or Windows
- Paid Claude subscription (Pro, Max, Team, or Enterprise)
- A free account at [skyglide.ai](https://skyglide.ai?utm_source=cowork&utm_medium=plugin&utm_campaign=skyglide_cowork_v1)

## Troubleshooting

**Profile not applying?** Check that `~/.claude/CLAUDE.md` contains a `<!-- SKYGLIDE:START -->` block. If not, say "set up Skyglide" to re-run setup. Make sure you've restarted Claude Desktop after initial setup.

**Skills not triggering?** This is a known Cowork platform issue on Windows affecting all plugins (including Anthropic's own). It doesn't matter for day-to-day use — your profile lives in CLAUDE.md, not in a skill. The setup skill only needs to work once, and Claude can fall back to reading the skill file manually.

**Want to start fresh?** Say "uninstall Skyglide" to remove your profile from CLAUDE.md, then say "set up Skyglide" to start over. If you've already uninstalled the plugin, you can manually remove the block between `<!-- SKYGLIDE:START -->` and `<!-- SKYGLIDE:END -->` from `~/.claude/CLAUDE.md`.

## Learn More

- [skyglide.ai](https://skyglide.ai?utm_source=cowork&utm_medium=plugin&utm_campaign=skyglide_cowork_v1) — Take the assessment
- [Cowork Plugin Docs](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/plugins) — Plugin development reference
- [Agent Skills Docs](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/skills) — How skills work

## License

Apache 2.0 — see [LICENSE](LICENSE)
